device.info.title: Device informations
device.manage.descr: Here you can manage your device allowed to connect to your Caliopen account, set restrictions on some IP addresses and custom the name of your device to better identify it later.
device.manage.title: Manage Your device
device.manage_form.ips.infotext: Restrict the access of your account to certain IP addresses for this device. (e.g. 192.168.10 or 192.168.1.1/24 or 192.168.1.1-20)
device.manage_form.ips.label: IP or subnet address
device.manage_form.name.infotext: This is the name which allows you to identify your device everywhere.
device.manage_form.name.label: Name:
device.manage_form.type.infotext: You can select the type of your device: smartphone, tablet, laptop or desktop.
device.manage_form.type.label: Type:
device.revoke.descr: Please be careful about this section! This operation will delete this device which will be unable to access to your Caliopen account in the future.
device.revoke.title: Revoke this device
device.verify.descr: You need to verify this device to allow it to access to your Caliopen account. Please note that this action can have an impact on your Privacy Index according to the device information and settings. You'll find below some informations about the device which tried to connect to your Caliopen account.
device.verify.title: Verify you device

signup.feedback.required_privacy: We need your privacy policy agreement
signup.feedback.required_tos: We need your terms and conditions agreement
signup.feedback.unavailable_username: We are sorry, this username is not available
signup.feedback.username_double_dots: The username cannot contain two dots (.) next to the other
signup.feedback.username_invalid_charact: The username cannot contain some special characters like "@`:;<>[]\ and space
signup.feedback.username_length: The length of the username must be be between 3 and 42
signup.feedback.username_starting_ending: The username cannot start or end with a dot (.)
signup.form.password.label: Password:
signup.form.privacy.checkbox.label: I understand and agree
signup.form.privacy.intro: Throughout the development phase, we collect some data (but no more than the NSA).
signup.form.privacy.title: Privacy policy
signup.form.recovery_email.label: Backup email address
signup.form.tos.label: I agree Terms and conditions
signup.form.username.label: Username:
signup.privacy.modal.label: About Piwik
signup.privacy.modal.text.alpha_tester: As an alpha-tester your contribution is precious and will allow us to finalize Caliopen.
signup.privacy.modal.text.desactivate_dn: You need to deactivate the DoNotTrack setting from your browser preferences (more informations at http://donottrack.us), as well as allowing cookies.
signup.privacy.modal.text.get_data: For this purpose, you grant us the right to collect data related to your usage (displayed pages, timings, clics, scrolls ...almost everything that can be collected!).
signup.privacy.modal.text.piwik: We use https://piwik.org/ the open-source analytics plateform. The collected data will not be disclosed to any third party, and will stay scoped to Caliopen's alpha testing purpose.
signup.privacy.modal.text.sensitive_mess: Obviously, we don't advise to exchange sensitive messages during the alpha phase.
signup.privacy.modal.title: Caliopen is under development !
signup.title: Create your account
